skill.name: logo-generator
skill.description: Generate logos using Replicate AI and make them transparent with background removal.
skill.summary: Generate logos using Replicate AI and make them transparent with background removal.
skill.author: AayushBaniya2006

security_audit.summary: This skill is a legitimate logo generation tool using Replicate AI. All 109 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES: the scanner confused TypeScript template literals and markdown code formatting with shell command execution; flagged standard API token environment access as 'sensitive file access'; and misidentified 'K_EULER' (a diffusion model scheduler name) as a weak cryptographic algorithm. The script makes legitimate network calls to Replicate API and writes output to a specific local path only.

low_findings.title: Environment variable access for API authentication
low_findings.description: The script reads REPLICATE_API_TOKEN from environment variables. This is required for authenticating with the Replicate service. Standard practice, not a vulnerability.

low_findings.title: Network calls to external Replicate API
low_findings.description: The script makes HTTP requests to Replicate's API endpoints. Legitimate API usage for logo generation.

content.value_statement: Creating logos requires design skills and expensive software. This skill uses AI to generate custom logos from text prompts and removes backgrounds automatically for transparent, professional results.
actual_capabilities: Generate logos from text descriptions using Replicate AI
Remove backgrounds automatically for transparent logos
Customize logo prompts with company names and styles
Process images with Sharp for optimal quality
limitations: Requires REPLICATE_API_TOKEN environment variable to be set
Limited to the specific logoai model on Replicate
Output is fixed to PNG format at public/assets/logo.png

use_cases.title: Quick brand identity
use_cases.description: Generate a professional logo for your startup without hiring a designer

use_cases.title: Channel branding
use_cases.description: Create logos for YouTube channels, podcasts, or social media profiles

use_cases.title: App icons
use_cases.description: Generate icons and logos for web or mobile applications

prompt_templates.title: Simple logo
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a logo for my company. Prompt: 'Minimalistic tech logo for [company name]'

prompt_templates.title: Styled logo
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a modern logo with prompt: 'Modern geometric logo for [brand] with blue and white colors'

prompt_templates.title: Detailed design
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a professional logo. Prompt: 'Elegant minimalist logo for [business] featuring a mountain icon in navy blue'

prompt_templates.title: Custom style
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate a unique logo. Prompt: 'Vintage style badge logo for [company] with retro typography and gold accents'

output_examples.input: Generate a logo for my tech startup called CloudSync
output: Generated logo with prompt: 'Minimalistic tech logo for CloudSync'
Logo generated successfully using Replicate AI model

output_examples.input: Create a modern logo for my coffee shop brand BrewMaster
output: Generated logo with prompt: 'Modern coffee shop logo for BrewMaster'
Ready for use on website and packaging

best_practices: Include the company or brand name in your prompt for accurate results
Specify the style (minimalist, modern, vintage) for better outcomes
Set REPLICATE_API_TOKEN in .env.local before generating logos
anti_patterns: Using vague prompts like 'make a cool logo' without details
Forgetting to set the REPLICATE_API_TOKEN environment variable
Generating logos without specifying brand context or style preferences

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code through the skill system.

faq.question: What image formats does it output?
faq.answer: The skill outputs PNG format with full transparency for professional use.

faq.question: How do I connect to Replicate?
faq.answer: Set REPLICATE_API_TOKEN in your .env, .env.local, or .env.production file.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: The skill only sends prompts to Replicate API. Generated images stay in your project.

faq.question: What if the logo generation fails?
faq.answer: Check that REPLICATE_API_TOKEN is valid and has sufficient API credits available.

faq.question: How is this different from other logo tools?
faq.answer: This skill combines logo generation and background removal in one automated workflow.
